important.name: the commandments
important.description: These are our unholy commandments, given to us by ou unholy Overlord, Izzy. Thou shalt follow her command, as it is what keeps us together as a family.

important.name: announcements
important.description: Listen to the screams of the howler for important news revolving around just about everything. Just don't get too close or he'll eat you.

important.name: wall of shame
important.description: This is where your name will be put after commiting a crime against our unholy commandments. Whoever is on this list, we hope they never do it again.

important.name: chat description
important.description: You wish to learn about the ways of the beast's words? Read this and you shall be educated about where to speak of what.

important.name: roles explanation
important.description: This channel holds education on the hierarchy of the overlord. If you're confused about someone's role, thou shalt be educated here.

important.name: chat suggestions
important.description: You have a chat idea and wish to have it implemented? Expose your ideas here and be judged by thy council

important.name: questions to the council
important.description: Pose thine questions to the council and ask about the ways of the beast. Even suggestions for improvements are very welcome.

important.name: vote
important.description: Democracy to the masses. If there's something we have to decide as a group, this is where we'll put it.

important.name: submissions
important.description: There's an art contest going on and you wish to submit thy offering? Look no further, for this is where you shall put it.

demon_speak.name: speaking in tongues
demon_speak.description: speak of thyself, speak of thy lord, praise the unholy and anything else. A general place where all demons unite and speak the unspoken.

demon_speak.name: memes
demon_speak.description: You have funny pictures and videos? You have unholy relics from the internet? THIS is the place for you.

demon_speak.name: ominous visions
demon_speak.description: You wish to show your every day life to us? maybe you practice witchcraft and have created a new spell? Then this is where it goes, so we can all admire it.

demon_speak.name: our familiar pictures
demon_speak.description: You have a familiar you wish to share pictures of? Wether it's a cat, a dog, a rat, hamster or a dragon, put it here and we will enjoy it together

demon_speak.name: spoopy stuff
demon_speak.description: You found a curseth creature in the woods? Maybe it found you? CAREFUL, BEHIND YOU. Welp, whatever it is, if it seems scary, ugly and should not exist, put it here.

demon_speak.name: political topics
demon_speak.description: You have a discussion about religion, politics or just a controversial thing in general? Better put it here, so it doesn't spam the main chat. And remember to respect thy neighbor.

demon_speak.name: demon rescue
demon_speak.description: We are a big family. We wish to fight with you against the big sad, so please put it here so it may never go unnoticed in the main chat. Wether you need advice, encouragement or just wish to talk, this is where you wanna do it.

demon_speak.name: demon cuisine
demon_speak.description: You cook? you make drinks? you just wanna share your meal? You're welcome to do it here, because this chat is all about the holy thing called FOOD.

artists_supporting_artists.name: overlords handiwork
artists_supporting_artists.description: The channel that revolves around our unholy demon overlord, Izzy. This is where she links new posts after publishing them.

artists_supporting_artists.name: runes and hieroglyphs
artists_supporting_artists.description: Thee hath created a thing? Then THIS is THE place to put thine art and writings for all to endulge.

artists_supporting_artists.name: shameless plug
artists_supporting_artists.description: You wish to promote thyself? Whatever it is, THIS is the place for you.

artists_supporting_artists.name: art tips
artists_supporting_artists.description: A chat for all the glorious tutorials and tips to give to your fellow demons and help improve the demonic arts.

artists_supporting_artists.name: fite the algorithm
artists_supporting_artists.description: This chat holds information on the glorious instagram algorithm and how you may beat it.

programmer_demons.name: programmer hell
programmer_demons.description: You create magical discord golems for fun? You like to convince machines to automate your tasks?

programmer_demons.name: bot tester
programmer_demons.description: This is a hidden channel. it's used to test the new features of the unholy golems.

games.name: entertainment hell
games.description: You wish to speak about the ways of the jester? Look no further, for games, music and all else should be here.

games.name: games vc
games.description: The chat to share thoughts about games and use while gaming. Nothing better than some good mind games featuring the commoners.

inner_demons.name: the summoning circle
inner_demons.description: If you wish to communicate thine thoughts of all sorts to someone else, this is where thee shalt go. No better way to enjoy time together and get to know the people.

demonic_chanting.name: music
demonic_chanting.description: You wish to listen to demonic chanting and hymns of the olden ones? Then you should go here and use a bot to get your soul riled up, if you didn't sell it, that is.

demonic_chanting.name: demons screeches
demonic_chanting.description: SCREACH THY CHANTINGS FOR WE WISH TO SING WITH YOU. The channel for Karaoke Supreme.
